text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: They have turned the final corner onto the last straight! Cheval Grand goes on the attack! Can she make it!?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Ha, hah, hah, haah! 
…Hah… hah… haa…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Tch, damn it!
One day. As the sun was setting on the field, I happened to notice a uma musume training as though her life depended on it.
Cheval Grand, the girl who had a good attack in the mock race the other day, but unfortunately only placed 2nd.
Her starting dash was good, and I could tell she had good stamina too. And how she timed her attacks with textbook precision was all too impressive.
Even with victory escaping her grasp, I felt that with a little polishing, she'd can become an amazing uma musume.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …cough, cough, cough! …Pwah, haah!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Aaaaagh!
I'm worried that she's been pushing herself to the limits without any breaks. Though she might think I'm meddlesome, I decided to call out to her when I saw my chance.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Gulp. 
…Ah. …Time to go home.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
Huh!? 
Um, uh, uhh… Are you talking to me?
choice_data_list: Yeah, I'm a little worried about you
Yeah, I'm a little worried about you

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: "Worried…"

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Ah… Um, I'm sorry. I'm alright. I'm alright, so…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Goodbye…
Ah, she quickly ran away…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …I've done it now…

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (The way I ran away yesterday wasn't good, was it. They were just looking out for me…)
(…Or rather, I was acting reckless enough to make even an unknown Trainer worry about me.)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
Vivlos
text_block_list.text: It's Chevacchi～!

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: Going at your own pace as usual. Mother said we're having a house party tonight, you know.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Everyone's waiting for you! You should hurry up and change into your uniform, so the 3 of us can unveil them!

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …Why should I? Even if I wasn't there… You two would be enough.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: There's no way that's the case! If Chevacchi doesn't come, everyone would be sad. Mom and dad really want to hear about how we're doing at school.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (How school's been going…)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
(They'd ask about the race… my dreams… 
I wonder if they'd actually ask these things…)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
… 
I'm good. I won't go.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Huh, why?

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: Because… I don't want to.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text:
Muu… I don't accept it. Chevacchi has to come too～! 
Big sis help convince her too.

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text:
…Hmm. 
Well, I guess there's days like this.

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Verxina
text_block_list.text: I'll explain it to everyone! Come now, Vivlos, let us be off. Let's not have the food go to waste!

text_block_list.name: Vivlos
text_block_list.text: Fine～, I got it～.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text:
…… 
…Sorry.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (There's no way I can talk about school with the two of them shining so brightly. And even if someone asked me about my dreams… I wouldn't be able to say anything.)

text_block_list.name: Young Cheval
text_block_list.text:
Wah! 
I also, I also want to be like her!

text_block_list.name: Young Cheval
text_block_list.text:
No matter how much the odds are stacked against her, she took their cheers by force—— 
To be just like her, to be the "Greatest Uma Musume!"
(I was able to say that confidently when I was younger. But, the me now-)
text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: (…Of course, I can't do it.)

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …I better hurry home.

text_block_list.name: Cheval Grand
text_block_list.text: …I really don't want to go back.
